name: Freelander
tagline: Simple landing page that just works.
body:
## Installation

### Developers

```
$ composer create-project umpirsky/freelander -s dev freelander.dev
$ cp freelander.dev/config.json.dist freelander.dev/config.json
$ cd freelander.dev/web
$ php -S localhost:8000
```

### Web designers, humans and my mom

> Todo.

## Configuration

After installing Freelander, just copy `config.json.dist` to `config.json` and start configuring it.

Here is each option explained:

* `debug` - Runs in debug mode if `true`. Useful while setting up since it gives detailed error messages. Don't forget to change to `false` after deploy.

* `mailchimp.apikey` - Enable MailChimp integration to your landing page by providing a [API key](http://kb.mailchimp.com/accounts/management/about-api-keys).

* `mailchimp.list.id` - Each MailChimp list have a unique ID. Provide one where you want your customer to be subscribed. [Need help finding your list ID](http://kb.mailchimp.com/lists/managing-subscribers/find-your-list-id).

* `mailchimp.options` - Here some advanced options can be set to underlying MailChimp API. Some of them are `timeout` and `debug`. For more information check official [MailChimp repository](https://bitbucket.org/mailchimp/mailchimp-api-php).

* `ga.configuration.code` - Add Google Analytics tracking code to your landing page by adding a tracking ID number. [Need help finding your tracking ID?](https://support.google.com/analytics/answer/1032385?hl=en)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
